attributes.action: David Cameron should wait till state pension age for any pension.
attributes.additional_details:
David Cameron and bus government have imposed sweeping pension changes, forcing then onto public sector workers.
Part of these changes have included people having to wait until state pension age if they leave the scheme.
David Cameron's strap line was "In it together" so it's only right that he waits till SPA like everyone else.
attributes.background:
David Cameron has resigned from his position as Prime Minister of the UK , following a vote for the UK to leave the EU.
As he has resigned from his role he should be forced to wait until state pension age to withdraw any accrued pension.

rejection.details: You could start a new petition calling for the rules on the pension entitlement for former Prime Ministers to be changed. Otherwise, this would be a personal decision for Mr Cameron.
